com.mordoch.chemtools

Class Conversion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mordoch.chemtools.Conversion

  • public abstract class Conversion
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used as a conversions library for conversions applicable to chemistry.

    Conversion types are length, molar, mass, and volume.

    All methods are static; this class is abstract.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ariel M
    See Also:
    Run
